name: Sir Francis Drake
overview: An adventure game about the travels of Sir Francis Drake from the book "Brainteasers for the Commodore 64" also published in Commodore User 1985/01 (Games Extra Book). Authentic, historic graphical adventure game. Francis Drake left Plymouth in 1577 to search for the North-West passage to the Pacific. He encountered stormy weather in the Straits of Magellann and lost two ships. Then the wind dropped....
